A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very very very disappointing. Not everything has to be Marvel. They killed a character that could bring way more interesting lore. It tries to be bold but sometimes it just doesn't work. It's shot nicely though but that doesn't when the story is a sequel and they just kick you in the nuts just for speculating. Star Wars is dead. Empire Strikes Back and A New Hope are the only good Star Wars movies.
